mission.posting: A relatively unknown Hacker 'Striker' has reputedly built a very nice memory dump generator. We'd like a copy.

email.subject: Striker's Stash
email.body:
A relativley unknown Hacker 'Striker' has reputedly built a very nice memory dump generator. We'd like a copy. ---- The target's system is relativley well defended, but nothing you shouldn't be able to handle. I'd like this job to be as clean as possible - no unnecessary destruction or trouble if you can manage it. Grab a copy of the memory dump generator and upload it to the hub drop server.
Good Luck, -Kaguya

attachments.note: Investigate Striker's server. Search for a memory dump generator program and download a copy. Upload it to the hub drop server.
